WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to create a DLL which contain a Thumbnail.png image. I set the image as "Embedded Resource", because I want to refer the dll in another C# metro Main project to load the image. I have tried several methods.
1. The first situation：
Code in the C# Class Library project (the project name is MusicData) as follow:
BitmapImage bitmap = new BitmapImage(new Uri("ms-resource://MusicData/Files/Images/Thumbnail.png"));
Set "Content" as Build Action for the image.
Then in C# metro Main project, select the MusicData Class Library project as the reference.
As that, I can load the image successful in the Main project.
 
2. The second situation：
Code as follow:
BitmapImage bitmap = new BitmapImage(new Uri("/MusicData;component/Images/Thumbnail.png", UriKind.Relative));
Set "Embedded Resource" as Build Action for the image.
Then in C# metro Main project, select the MusicData.dll as the reference.
But I can not load the image in Main metro project.
 
The second situation is I actually wanted! The Main metro project just needed the MusicData.dll not the whole Class Library Project.
Help me please...
WorkItem.Summary: How to get the image which is as "Embedded Resource" in DLL
